abstracts.cdata!:
This document is based on the final
            report of a study for the design of a securitization diagram
            of forestry in Mexico, for providing long-term funding for
            beneficiaries such as planters who supported the Agenda for
            Development of Forest Plantations, which was developed in
            compliance with terms of reference for the implementation of
            the project. The study is based on the Strategic Forestry
            Program for Mexico 2025 and the National Forest Program
            2001-2006. A key issue in order to realize the National
            Forestry program 2001-2006 is funding, since the state of
            the national eco-economic area has large challenges
            necessary to seek alternatives for financial resources
            enabling care, conservation and the development of
            commercial forest plantations.
